description: Do you have a business idea that you want to make a reality? Do you desire to make some extra money online but don't have any money to start with? This course is going to teach you step by step how I started my aerial drone company with no money, no business experience, no roadmap, and grew it to over $100k in my first year. I will show you the exact blueprint I used myself, that you can copy to start your own business. I start with motivation and getting your mind right, then move on to the idea phase, implementation phase, and growth. It is possible to start a business with $0. It is possible to be your own boss and have the freedom of owning you own company. It is all possible and this course will prove it!
title: How I Started My Business With Zero and Grew to Six Figures!
